text: 4:20-21 Onger Akaba 115:3; Hibru 11:19Egha Abraham uan nɨghnɨzir gavgavim anetaghizir puvatɨ. Egha Godɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzim gɨnɨghnɨgha navir pumuningɨn itir puvatɨ. An nɨghnɨzir gavgavim a gamima a bar gavgavigha Godɨn ziam fe. A bar fo, God uan akar dɨkɨrɨzimɨn gɨn mangɨ bizir kam damuamin gavgavim iti.
